snippet.title: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Prepare for a new action RPG in Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning. Get a first look at the world and the combat in this exciting gameplay trailer!

IGN's YouTube is just a taste of our content. Get more:
http://www.ign.com

Want this week's top videos? Sign up:
http://go.ign.com/VideoRound-up
